dict.acceptation: 写（ write的现在分词）；写信；

sent.orig: Writing is an important part in junior English language learning and teaching (ELT).
sent.trans: 写作(writing)是初中英语教学的一个重要的组成部分。

sent.orig: The writing teaching of Korean university and college includes two fields: literature writing and article writing.
sent.trans: 韩国高校的写作教学主要包括两大领域：以文学为对象的写作和以文章为对象的写作。

sent.orig: After that, the students will do the class writing, the group writing and the individual writing.
sent.trans: 接著，同学们会进行大班写作、小组写作及个人写作活动，发挥创意。

sent.orig: Hello everyone, I'm Writing case, Writing case is not common, is a robot Writing case.
sent.trans: 大家好，我叫文具盒，可不是普通的文具盒，是一种机器人文具盒。

sent.orig: Who are you writing to? I'm writing to my girlfriend.
sent.trans: 你在写信给谁？我在写信给我女朋友。
